001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.Button;
008import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
009import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.databinding.FragmentLoadingBinding;
011
012/**
013 * A {@link Fragment} subclass used to display and manage a loading view while a game is waiting
014 * for more players to join.
015 */
016@AndroidEntryPoint
017public class LoadingFragment extends Fragment {
018
019  private FragmentLoadingBinding binding;
020
021  @Override
022  public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container,
023      Bundle savedInstanceState) {
024    binding = FragmentLoadingBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
025    return binding.getRoot();
026  }
027}
